name: Create Shopify fulfillments from new Google Sheets rows
description:
Every time you add a new row to a specified Google Sheets document, a new fulfillment will be created for the corresponding order.
You will need to create a Google Sheets document like [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Es_MFr_XLvVXpLglxqdIZw5b4H_eUMAK_l4A0qK82GI/edit?usp=sharing)
